uhh it is kinda boring now it is a stunning game but there is little to no endgame content and the pity system is extremely unfair and annoying the game creators have barely any representation of black cultures with characters and designs other than a few other problems the game is a solid rpg mmo game with fun gameplay lots of characters and cool characters animations the lore of the game is very deep and is all explained or yet to be this is not a grindy game so play once every few days

been playing since and when it first was released it felt like there were so much to do however genshin impact has not added any sustainable content since release except new domains and bosses each requiring resin for the first three while the rest is resin resin is capped out at per day and one takes eight minutes to regenerate so to get all your resin back it takes minutes this is a major issue for players who are willing to commit to the game or have played for a long time

the game is good has a story world and characters that keep me coming back and i play regularly on pc but it turns out you kind of need a relatively newish phone to play the mobile version granted my phone is not super old but the mobile version should not be so unstable that it is a gamble if i can even get past the title screen it feels like while this is a good looking game for mobile it is the fact that it is so graphically intensive that keeps it from being playable on mobile

the dialogue is a bit slow and cut scenes cannot be skipped but the game is fun a bit tedious on grinding for the mats for wishes character weapon summons best part is being able to carry your account from platform to platform update would also like to add that the game needs a fast forward option for the dialogue a skip feature for any all cut scenes better camera management during combat it is constantly sinking into the dirt and characters get knocked over by the slightedof breezes

still a good game though i only use mobile for purchases and primarily play on pc i wish the game did not time gate as much and expanded the ability to play more at the users own pace regardless of how fast it slow they would like to go through content but understand the game is still in development and this may not be feasible at this time i hope they do consider increasing resin improving drop rates and attribute rates on artifacts and updating the standard banner as the game matures

played for more than a year or so but the problem is that the commissions are repetitive the game events are not really desirable over time and you will eventually get boredi am rating it as three stars since the game needs significant improvements in terms of these things i have mentioned also forcing players to play for the commissions and their welkin moon is kind of annoying to me there should be a convenient feature for the welkin moon that charges you more but you do not have to log in

this game is great i played it for a few months and id say i recommend it the graphics are so beautiful there are tons of interesting characters the story is interesting and you can freely explore the open world but some parts are tedious and also sometimes the game crashes or goes slow i played it on many different devices and the same keeps happening also once you make the missions that you can and you need to level up to do the next one sometimes is too tedious and you can do nothing

have been playing the game for a week now everything seems perfect and fun except for the monstrous size of the app and the data it consumes during each update it would be more efficient if the players could configure what additional file to download or not as per there choice just like pubg apex ledgen or even like league of ledgens

a great game that makes me want to invest some time into it however makes it near impossible to do so due to the energy system resin this makes especially less linear farming such as artifacts extremely lengthy with very little rewards if you get unlucky overall i would still recommend it however would also make clear that this is not a game you can easily pick up and get everything quickly alone due to special five stars that appear like twice a year at bestyou are okay with grind go for it

it is not for me for starters i do not understand the appeal of generic anime art but thought it was worth a try since it is so popular i do not enjoy the strange character switching mechanic and can already see how they will make buying characters seem necessary for many players whilei am fine with games having some micro transactions i think it should only be for fluff i would rather buy a game outright even so it ran very smoothly on my tablet and the sheer size of the map was impressive

this game was a great play not too long ago it had great captivating graphics and the lore was interesting the new update has made this game unplayable on my phone the graphics are quite bad the frame rate is below and it is constantly freezing or crashing i cannot move two steps without the game shutting down great game ifyou are phone can handle all of the new data with each update

great game battle mechanics and graphics are really smooth quite a lot to learn in the beginning so it may be quite confusing the only downside side is the rng mechanic of the game five edit after patch two four the texts on mobile for the wish banner and updates are extremely zoomed in where it is inconvenient and makes navigating through surveys and wish history very difficult and annoying in game currency given to the player is low compared to others slow paced game without much to do

i love the game and i pop on from time to time but i hopped on again after a long while i play on my laptop as well both my phone and computer use the same account but when i tried to get on mobile it is acting likei am a new player and asking me to pick a twin please fix account restarts i think you would call it idk it is just weird that my account data is suddenly gone

long process to follow through this game is not made for phones because the file is quite large the story every traveler experiences is a long journey to complete the game has a larger map to wander through the co op is now more wide open to friends and viewers for streamers to interact with the system slowly but surely will be more likable to new players i would wish myself that if possible there was not such a difficult weapon banner for players to struggle with

really enjoy this game two issues one ios has wireless controller support but android does notthat is absurd please fix it two the process of pairing a save file between devices console and android for example has a very specific sequence that needs to be followed otherwise you have to beg customer support to unlink one device which takes potentially more than a week and a half this sequence is not explained clearly except for on forums which you go to after you have gotten it wrong

pros one it is a beautifully crafted world with a rich story and lovable characters two the combat is fun and the exploration is enough to keep one adventuring for a while three you can tell that the developers put so much love into this game but the marketing division it is a mess and that leads me to cons one certain systems time gating remain broken since launch two rng on top of rng three predatory monetization four too much focus on money not enough on fixing content all in all solid

great game ifyou are here for the experience i would argue even the best one out there however if you were to stay here for long you gonna have to deal with a variety of problems from devs not fixing the most simple mistakes for years no joke to blantly ignoring their community when they are unhappy probably the most significant issue with this game is that it does notallow you to play whenever you want to play it afteryou are done with the quests so instead it becomes a second job

okay mobile game awful story writing with a lot of unecessary dialog characters are well designed and mostly balanced but some have years old glitches left unfixed while they continue to pile on new characters e g dionas skill and burst still hit objects instead of enemies even when they are closer than the objects wish there were more settings we could mess with obviously pay to win

it is a good game and fp friendly i just installed this after a long time i left but it has has a very troublesome problem which you were downloading the resources and suddely the wifi become sucks or you quit halfway your current progress will be loss as you will start to the very beginning of your download the game cannot detect its game file such a waste of time

its great i have been playing since launch basically so it is been a fun time for sure but i cannot say its perfect for newer players it will be difficult to level up certain characters due to materials being locked until you reach certain levels or clear certain areas i do not think i would recommend it for a casual player but someone whos going to marathon the game in like a week should not have too much of a problem

i play of the time on pc but use the android version when i travel this app runs poorly on my two year old mid range phone but it is to be expectedi am honestly impressed it runs at all and that is thanks to the many graphical options my only complaint is that hoyoverse does notsupport controller input on android despite supporting it on ios since early more than anything i find the touch controls make the gameplay feel awful hoyoverse could and should offer a better experience

i would have to say that this game is an exceptional one in terms of lore quality the beauty of going on adventure and experiencing fantasy however it is not friendly to new players there is a lot a new player must overcome in order to truly experience what a lot of us veteran players do new player lock out is a definitely driving those who wish to enjoy the game away especially if they are bound to start off as mobile players this needs to be fixed and so does the resin system

definitely a good game i play it a lot on pc and i downloaded it for chromebook because google play said it was compactible which it is but sadly the graphics are set to be high as a default on mobile and it always crashes every time i enter the door and reach the loading screen the game really needs a settings option outside of the game or have default graphics values to be lower please do this change

im only giving it three because the actual game is good but the mobile version is a pain the hyakunin ikki event is one example it takes many tries to get enough points to get the first rewards and the reason is not that i cannot defeat the enemies it is that the enemies take an actual minute to spawn all the time trials in the mobile version have this issue too the objectives do not spawn in under ten seconds the laggy cutscenes in quests are unbearable when you actualty care about the story

fun at first however not much is explained very well for new players leaving most people to find out through trial and error open map puzzles have hardly any hints on how to do them and the rewards for those puzzles and the entire game for that matter are very lackluster gear for characters can take months depending on your luck gameplay and visuals are nice but take up so much space overall rng based gameplay for anything you actually need to play

i love this game fun game play good map but the only problem is it takes too much space this is like the only game i can have it takes storage to download every good part of the gameplay but i seriously cannot get one other app i really hate that part of genshin but although it takes too much space it is a fun game if it is possible please lower the amount of space genshin impact uses to run smoothly or i will not be able to talk to my friends thank you

it is a great game overall good graphics nice gameplay and a really inmersive story with beautiful characters tailored so everyone finds a favorite but the games big flaw is in mechanics i swear when it comes to farming most things are not so hard to get but artifacts which are indispensable for actually using a character you like are so boring and tedious to aquire you will probably end up dropping the game after you have to farm for them you should think over that hoyoverse

great to a point i played this on phone and playstation although there is a point where you get stuck unless you have a lot of friends that play too one area you cannot complete without a full team of players there needs to be guilds to complete for those who have friends just not interested in this type of game otherwise your stuck and cannot progress ending all the work you have completed which is a huge downfall for the game itself if you can get multiple friends to play cool go for it

first of all this game is good good graphics good music and good story but it is lagging and consume more battery and give us the option to twick the draw distance because it load the metres away mountain and that is what makes the game lag most of the time the camera is far far away from the character if it is near the character i would be immersed in the gameplay the camera zoom is not helping because after some times the camera comes to the normal position

i was recommended this game a lot by my friends but it just does notwork well on android every time it gets to the wearing headphones may improve your gaming experience part the game usally crashes and closes down also the loading takes way too long as well as the dowloading

i just updated it and when i get in the second loading screen finish it give me reconnecting to server before go to loading screen again it fine for like a few times but it keeps on repeating like more than times already my line is fine too i try again the next day and it is still like that it keeps on repeating and it is not like i can properly log out like this it is getting annoying

its a great game the visuals along with it being playable on computer as well as my phone with the same account and enabling crossplay is great the only let down and to me it is worth two stars is the lack of controller support if when they add it i will update but till then i will have to play it on computer

has quite some issues bugs in characters that is never been fixed ridiculously high prices for in game currency that just is not justifiable at this point poor storylines complete ignorance when it comes to complaints by international players the list could go on and on extreme high usage of storage space however it is still an amazing game stunning sceneries graphics characters and events i enjoy this game more than anything else but i hope there will be some changes in the future

the downloading resources is repeating back to zero i waited for several hours to download it to gb i paused it and i decided to continue it later but it back to start again repeating me to download gb resources i did not reset or clear anything and the storage of this game is here filling my phone storage i repeat it two times but it did not work back to start again

i play on pc because this game refuses to load on my phone the game overall is amazing with one of the best elemental systems i have ever seen it can be laggy on pc and takes up a huge amount of space it is very large for a mobile game and despite having uninstalled and reinstalled changed phones used wifi ect it never goes past the loading screen it is my favorite game but i do not see how playing on mobile is even viable considering the sheer size of the game

every single time i decided to fight a weekly boss it goes perfectly fine the grind is great and the rewards are gud except wheni am fighting childe for so damn reason every single time i fought him to get the weekly rewards and every single tike it gets to his final form the game decides that its a great idea to leave me on a screen where i can see the boss but i cannot do anything i cannot move cannot attack cannot heal cannot go into the inventory cannot even quit the game please fix

the game is really good with the aspects of character designs storyline and the battle mechanics the only thing that bugs me is the resin even ifyou are trying to build up a good character or you want to go for domains you cannot get anything nor can you upgrade anything ifyou are out of resin just increase the amount of resin permanently or just reduce the time in which the resin accumulates

i have been playing for a while now and i absolutely love this game however after the two four update i noticed that everytime i use an elemental burst of a five star character to a number of enemies or group of enemies and bosses all of their hp bar disappears including those that i did not use it to even the names of npcs disappear and is disrupting my gameplay it is draining and time consuming to restart the game everytime i use my characters burst so i hope that this can be fixed thanks

the story is nice though it has plot holes characters have good designs but some are quite underwhelming in combat beautiful graphics the pity system sucks espicially the weapon banner wich requires you to lose two times before you can get the weapon you wanted after reaching endgame you do not really have anything to do other than daily commissions events and spending resin wich generates very slowly co op mode does nothave much things to do

i usually play it on my laptop and i liked it so much i wanted to play on my mobile device until i removed several apps and pictures videos and still was not able to download it the amount of space this game takes up for mobile is unreal to the point of litterally being unrealistic it takes up about one four one three of my phones total storage however on pc it is a wonderful game and if you have the storage capacity i encourage you to try it the graphics and fighting mechanics are wonderful

updates suck on android i have done pre downloads and even new versions always mess up getting on and i have to completely uninstall reinstall the game sometimes like now even that does notwork soi am writing this since i cannot even get on the game i love the game in general but getting resources to get new characters is extremely time consuming considering they only give you five to primogems for a majority of the quests ps is easier by far for both gameplay and updates

i do not like giving it a three star it is one of the best and most advanced games on the store right now but it does notjustifies the space it takes the game is already big but also a lot of unnecessary stuff is takes up space even after they are over event cinematics etc there should be option to not download or remove this unnecessary stuff the game can be adjusted better for mobile too even the best phones turns into demo of hell after minutes of playing this

its awesome i would give it a five star if there werent any problems in my game play everytime i play ofc i log in so the problem is idk how many mins i can play but everytime i do smth like fighting enemies the game starts lagging and the screen turns back and kicks me out and when im in co op and that happens all my progress is restarted i hope this gets fixed cuz i rlly wanna play genshin while on the go

gacha impact is a game where you collect scantily clad mostly under age women and some dudes and fight monsters the game is great gameplay is responsive and flashy the game falls apart pretty quick pay your time or pay with money to make stupid inconveniences go away once progression is really important in games and this game wants to monetize that to encourage you to spend as much money as possible games get so much better than this

i really love the game and the fun gameplays and events that they have to offer however i would love to recommend with others to play the game i have some problems whenever i play it for a short amount of time the game ends up lagging completely and crashes not only the app but my phone as well i have to wait for about mins with the screen of a character i last played with their attacks and skills up still in a time freeze this happened too many times andi am worried for future players

played in the beginning left for awhile wanted to get back in for the anniversary but they really dropped the ball for anniversary with the weak ten pull this game has a fairly unreasonable pay structure for rewards the lack of resin has always been a huge problem this game was well received initally and i had high hopes it is too bad there have not been positive changes to improve enjoyment for the players overall

would love it if the game was optimized better it takes up quite a lot of space heats up the phone eats up the battery and lags heavily on slightly older phones a friend had to unfortunately drop this game altogether due to the increasing size andi am worried many others including myself will be affected as well all in all a great game love the open worldness and gorgeous atmosphere alongside wonderful music storyline is engaging with promising characters to boot

had to change my review though this game is made well filled with wonderful characters and story the game has slowed down to a crawl content is slow coming events are lackluster and boring the events that are fantastic should be simply in the game available to everyone at anytime it is sad that some of these events will never return resulting in new players in missing out on all the fantastic lore provided

this is seriously a good game for me i can get distracted easily since there are lots of other things to do than the main quest the characters are loveable and the scenery are spectacular have not gotten any lag spikes and i get to lower the resolution or heighten the resolution to whatever i want controlling the characters and fighting monsters is quite smooth the weapon banner pity system does nottransfer and the anniversary sucks a lot sometimes i wonder if mihoyo is really listenin

it is my favourite game and i am very dedicated to it but there is a flaw in the game which bugs the hell out of me the wangshu quest disables co operative mode until completion but for me and many others the quest is not operating properly so i have to sweep it under the rug but that is impossible due to the fact i need co operative mode to make the game enjoyable

this game has a lot of issues that are hard to excuse but the parts that are fun are fun it would take a lot of time to get into all of the issues but to touch on some of them it seems like the characters that are struggling and need help will not get it inconsistent mechanics that seemed a randomly apply to one character but not all there is a lot of dead time do not pull in the weapon banner unless you intend to spend a lot of money rewards for completing quests seem really lackluster

tl dr be prepared to be disappointed ifyou are a gacha player who likes to grind play a lot but in general its very enjoyable many problems appeae in the form of of end content and the energy timegated system to get artifacts progress for better gear the story is very enjoyable but dont expect something well written a lot of character problems event rewards are okay but itself very boring to play there is no replayable content side quests can become very tiresome and the gacha is insane

after playing for one year genshin impact is an amazing game at the surface level great world building character designs combat system story and graphics however going deeper into the game it has many glaring issues that have not been addressed lack of endgame content high effort for low rewards qol changes resin system artifact rng overpriced gacha and the recent downgrading of story and characters the game becomes increasingly disappointing and a daily chore in the end

edit one of the greatest open world animethetic action rpgs of this time world character design is amazing and a joy to explore while listening to enchanting orchestral osts combat and grinding gets abit boring after a while but that is due to endgame but most of the latest characters need extreme balancing and any new players will be sol until they spend hours of main story extra weeks of grinding ar to be able to upgrade them mats are ar region locked this system makes no sense

i am new to this game so far i enjoy playing it my only suggestion is that they must not bar adventurers from leveling up their ranks because god it is so hard to do the ascension task at level though my heroes are at a higher level with the right element to combat the electro hypostasis still my heroes were underpowered it is so tiring to play and deal with them over and over again you should also consider hero replacements if your deployed heroes were all down haha

it is a great game but it would be greater if it has controller support another issue in the mobile version is that sometimes objects takes a long time to load and the interact button is sometimes late also the resin refresh rate feels like forever and the cost for just one wish is just too much with those odds of winning a four five star character

the game is so good early on and i have no major problems with the gacha for enjoyments sake it is free to play friendly there is also a small subscription option welkin bp for low spenders which is good in my personal opinion as well however resin is a major problem with this game specially at end game you get your characters you pull and get weapons then what to do with them it is frustrating that you can only fight a couple of bosses a couple of domains then you get random drops which do not amount to any upgrade andyou are done for the day at this point it is a daily login app not a game

a beautiful game many amazing characters and places to visit powerful weapons however sometimes the lack of communication and basic rewards with fans is frustrating especially adventure rank rewards the amount of resin needs to be adjusted as well as artifact rng we also need more reasons to play for more than minutes later into the game the only thing you end up doing is logging in doing commissions burning resin and logging off it often just feels like a chore

pretty good game overall the gameplay is fun the graphics are beautiful and the music is amazing it is also the only open world gacha game and has a huge map to explore however it is unfortunately run by a company who does notcare about it is community at all their refusal to properly address player concerns and fix issues that have existed since launch makes the user experience extremely frustrating

i enjoy the game but the rng gacha system being on basically everything really pulls it back it is even on the stats of the gear itself and there is no way to change them so you just have to continue griding and pray more co op things to do would be very nice balancing for characters is not the best also no controller support for android after a year really sucks all that said it is very pretty and nice music story can be good to

honest review game is beautiful honestly have not seen mobile games come close in terms of graphics and music score for beginners the game is fine but as you progress you realize the multiple issues this games has resin needs adjustments and the higher ups should listen to the community in terms of these issues it is also very free to play but pulling a character especially one you want is very difficult and expensive especially when you have decide between saving primojems or not

it gets very repetitive after a while and dialogues are way to long every new character you get is unusable unless you would be able to upgrade them to the same level as other characters and upgrades takes a lot of time the android version does not support controller which is not very optimal

good game but the resin system needs a rework it was fine when the game first came out due to limited amount of characters but seeing as we have double the amount of characters to farm for now the resin regeneration and cap needs to be much higher than before also the game is also quite lacking in end game content with only the spiral abyss dps check at the moment if there could be some kind of boss raid co op content would be much appreciated

awesome game beautiful art style huge open world map incredible ost really nice characters but keeps accumulating bugs who never get fixed or addressed the history writing recently got real rushed and bad character comes half baked on gameplay and their relevance on history is almost non existent even side characters have way more relevance and impact than the playable ones additionally the lack of proper communication throw down the mayor positive aspects of the game unfortunately

the gameplay world and music is fantastic but the lack of communication and community interactivity lately has been the most abysmal i have seen with a gacha this game started out very strong in these aspects but they have deteriorated at an alarming rate i do not mind the lack of rewards for anniversary but i just wish there was more fanfare more communication and transparency acknowledge problems instead of trying to sweep them under a rug and say they are going to be fixed

while the game itself is not bad it has become boring where there are less stuff to do there are a lot of re works of many characters that needs to be done i would also like to address the underwhelming reward of the anniversary where everything are web event and less in game content that has a few rewards

youre doing great with the map expansions puzzles are fun finding secret hidden chest is fun doing hidden quest is fun but exploring the map with maxed out characters is boring because you can do one hit per kill please add high risk zones for maxed out characters make us feel that we still need healers while exploring maps

the beginning experience is fun but at endgame the content becomes very dry and there is nothing meaningful to do outside of waiting for energy over time the devs started to get more careless and stopped acknowledging player feedback as much they have ignored multiple bugs with characters that have been there for a long time and now with the anniversary they have essentially ignored the player base entirely sad to see aside from that the characters are pretty cool

great game but there is still room for improvement please raise resin from to and condense resin from five to ten more cost halving opportunities for weekly bosses artifact sets are hard to complete please implement a rotation for the pieces the game visuals and soundtrack are ten out of ten it is just that if we go into the stage of filler patches again then we need the resin system to improve play at your own risk this game has greedy management

it was a really fun game however the endgame content felt like chores everyday there is no more adventure and fun and challenge besides the spiral abyss which is relatively easy for some but still rewards are so cheap and even for a gacha it still requires you to put so much money and effort into even getting to their pity which does not even guarantee the five star you want sometimes the soundtrack and graphics are amazing but on what has happened during these past few weeks is really bad

the gameplay itself is pretty good the graphics was so good the design of the characters places and the sound tracks are pretty good as well but the problem is when you reach the peak of the game end game it is like logging in do commission use resin log out i myself as an end game playeri am experiencing this type of loop for about months right nowi am ar and playing the game more than eight months i guess and i have spent money on this game genshin impact can improve

a fun blend action rpg adventure game with rather impressive visuals soothing soundtrack solid stories and fun characters the game is just stuck with a very tedious boring and sometimes frustrating endgame where it ends up being a massive grindfest and a highly predatory gacha system where all but five of the highest rarity units are limited to event specific banners also the company is mad stingy with its anniversary rewards

used to be a really good game but the recent quests feel rushed and the plot was anti climatic it is starting to feel superbly unfriendly to fp players and rewards have been disappointing there is nothing much to do daily and farming rarely gives anything good lore in the game now feels stale and even though they created a good setting for inazuma the promotional posters and built up suspense was useless by the end of the quest

developer does notlisten to feedback despite putting out a survey after every major update several characters are completely worthless or suffer from bugs which remain unfixed six months after their release resin system heavily limits gameplay as almost everything relies upon it would rate higher if they simply addressed issues since the base gameplay is actually very good

very good game easy to hook have some small issues which i always feedbacked but seem like not to fix anytime soon music and gameplay is great story characters and mechanic system are good at first but become unbalanced and go slightly downhill maybe because of rushing or low quality control while the game itself is great it is still have a lot of drawback recommended to gacha veteran and lover

been playing for a year now and all i can say is that the resin system needs improvement as for it is hard to farm for artifacts and materials with resin per day as well the rewards are somewhat stingy not enough for wishes which makes you pay real money for the wanted character weapon great storyline and graphics really like how a open world game that does notreally limit you to something is finally on mobile

an excellent game i have been playing since launch and have thoroughly enjoyed the journey i have two reasons for not giving five stars for one there used to be good communication between the devs and the community and now there seems to be nothing the second reason is that the most recent archon quest from two one felt extremely rushed plot lines felt unfinished plot holes were left unaddressed and character development was badi am hoping to see better stories in future updates

initially the game was awesome hands down it was the best i had ever played wrt graphics scenery characters and story the only disappointment is not the rewards but the lack of consideration towards the player base the story and world building is hands down the best but the pace at which updates roll are slow but frequent the amount of time it actually takes for the story to move on is too long and tires out many people like me minimal spender and if you miss a day you feel like you have lost something precious you have been building up i do not want more rewards hecki am fine with what we already have but please put more lore and give characters like lisa kaeya and amber more love so we can like them for who they are as characters and not the colorful numbers that pop up on the screen oh and where is ludi harpastum we were supposed to get that too right

the game is great beautiful scenery and music the story is great characters are amazing and its a very unique and enjoyable but as you progress there is lack of any sort of end game content except for the spiral abyss which pls instead of making floor and worse just add more floors or add something new also pls communicate with your players and listen to what they want its a lovely experience here and we want it to be better thanks

the graphics are beautiful the world is fun to explore the character design is amazing the music is also very nice it is a fun game in general but it needs a lot of effort to do stuff that just give u low rewards like the st anniversary you can give free stuff for promotions you can give a free four star for an event but sth better than ten wishes for one whole year of playing is enough at least fix some bugs or improve some aspects

edited first review might be too emotional love the games gameplay and music there are non event activities you can do to pass the time eg do music hangout at a sims house hide and seek events come by at least once or twice a week though cant still say much more about the games anniversary games lore is very interesting though the latest chapter is a bit lacking of sense there are also posts that are still not implemented distributed eg wings from the event from a fast food chain switch version of the game

visually stunning game and amazing soundtracks however most of the aspects of the game namely the domains relies heavily on rng which is quite frustrating the current pace for which the main story progresses is also slow the resin system whilst a normal feature in gacha games is severely limiting in genshin you can use up a days worth of resins in less than ten minutes but the greatest downside of this game is the way the company handles rewards and compensations which is lackluster

i have been playing since launch and have faithfully played until i hit the burnout wall for a couple months before archipelago update i have spent way more than i like to think on this game andi am not terribly proud of that ultimately this is a decent good game great art amazing visuals fun but the greediness from the gacha rates the resin system the artifact rng its sucking the life out of the player base add in the lack of endgame content and the lack of rewards and its a disaster

i mean the skeleton of the game is good solid gameplay good story exploration but then there is the really bad systems like resin gacha in general artifacts which makes the game just way less fun to play additionally the rewards in the game are not the best to say the least

late game makes you wish the company was not so stingy voice acting is good quality in every language runs okay on a galaxy s but is better on pc albeit with locked fps characters are cool cutscenes are extravagant graphics are amazing exploration is a blast and grinding is fun it is a shame about the greed and the lack of rewards

repetitive after you finish all the current story updates but inbetween updates you can farm primogems to save for new characters story and characters are great but wish we could somehow breeze through the time consuming non important daily commissions i between updates also wish there was an easier way to keep track of your wishes like a counter or something in the banner pages so we can easily see when we get our guaranteed five star

i really wish i could give this game a five star rating the open world is phenomenal and fun to explore as someone who is now in the late gamei am trying to entertain myself with photo taking of the beautiful scenery etc however ever since the two update things have really gone downhill the english stream for the two one update was delayed by one and a half hours characters have been released despite having seemingly unfinished kits and now the anniversary rewards mihoyo listen to the fans

overall the game is already good but the mechanics sucks please consider removing or decreasing the amount of resin needed for artifacts since it is one of the highest resin consumer on the game the artifacts system is based purely on luck to get the artifacts needed with good stats and sub stats please also consider changing the daily commission the rewards should differ based on difficulty ten for the easy and for hard commisions it may be randomized or fixed so its more rewarding

genshin impact is a great adventure without an entry barrier exploration is similar to breath of the wild collecting climbing gliding however combat is a fluid dance b w managing your partys abilities and chaining attacks the characters are all distinct with unique personalities the story filled with beautiful cutscenes lore and voice acting a visually impressive game edit decreased score due to low gacha rates and freemium currency i have hit soft hard pity for over half a year

i have played this game since release and i loved it exploration of a beautiful world amazing characters interesting lore but afteryou are done exploring and finished the quests there is nothing late game is a never ending grinding hell and that is it there is nothing left to do they keep releasing characters worth hundreds of ‚Ç¨ or months of grinding and saving full of problems that they wont even address the story does notmake any sense anymore the devs dont care and it shows

it was really exciting at first but now the storylines and characters are getting too boring the new events are not unique nor enjoyable once you reach a certain adventure rank the game becomes boring and repetitive it is getting very obvious that the games focus is on getting new players and does not care about its old players

genshin is probably the most beautiful game you can play at the moment the univers is simply stunning the animations are great though i wish they could be skipped after they have been seen once like old school rpgs this is one of the points where mihoyo fails to draw from its predecesors the characters are generally well thought out and fun to discover where things get hard is once you actually play the game the controls are absolutely horrible and controller support is nowhere in sight ios has had this for nearly a year now but some of the workarounds people have come up with on android have led to users being banned leaving you to contend with very underwhelming touchscreen controls you will also find yourself fighting the engine much more than the enemies there are a number of ways the game becomes anti immersive from the constant zooming in depending on your combat actions there should simply be a way to turn off auto zoom off but this illudes the devs completely to enemies walking off a preset area mid fight where they will walk back to their spawn point and regen hp and have you start the fight over something to drive you insane when fighting new and more powerfull foes all in all the game is good but some basic improvements would make it much more enjoyable

it is been almost one year since i started playing this but i rate it three stars because of a issue in the game my device is redmi note seven pro and runs perfectly fine in medium graphics however when i enter my serenitea pot the game freezes after two second of entering so i have to close the game and restart again from the long process of loading screens sometimes it also freezes when i try to interact with something within the pot please fix this problem then i will reconsider the rating

while the game itself is amazing this game is not meant to be played on mobile its highly optimized but there is still a lot of lag tabbing out of the app will cause you to relog into the game with an insanely long load time this app should only be used for story dialog or character enhancement anything where lag would not matter

when this game came out it was extremely good and i would have probably given it five stars but i wanted some time to chew on it exploration the world and core gameplay are all satisfying and fun characters are well designed and lots of cool secrets and clever things hidden for you to find my issues the materials in the game are cumbersome to get since weapons characters and equipment all need materials to level the gatcha rates pity or not are very very low steep power curve

game is amazing at first but the more you play spend the worse it gets they have a lot of security and balance issues at the moment which is making many of the player base weary of playing the game and many unwilling to spend and communication on these issues have been poor or poorly received game currently has a lot of progression strain on their stamina system resin specifically mora gold and hero xp getting a new hero takes two weeks of grinding to get them at a playable place then you need to spend even longer farming gear this leaves you at a place of always needing to farm for the future but the game is still great at it is base you can do everything but their end game three tower stages that reset bi monthly you can do those stages but will require a lot of careful investment it is a solid hours of content more if you do not rush through it until the security issues are fixed i would think before spending money otherwise give it a shot for a while but keep tabs on the communities of the game reddit is a good one but can be an echo chamber at times until at the least the security issues are fixed i cannot justify more than three stars and i only stand with that because of how much enjoyment the games world has given me since launch

game is free and some of the content is good i dont like the resin system and most of the artifacts that i get from the dungens is garbage i feel like the drop rate is rigged for example if i try to farm the set i want alone in my world i do not get the set i want but if i farm it in my friends world i get it easily we me and my friend try to farm our sets by visiting one another its so frustrating and gems are so over priced i have spend money on this game but now i wish did not

the gameplay is fun but improving your team in this game is extremely slow you need to kill the same boss a lot of times farm a large amount of gold exp and skill books so you need more than a month worth of energy to reach max level and level the skills to lvl nine lvl ten requires a very limited item for a single character do not forget about the equipment the rng for getting artifacts is insane you could be farming for months to get a set of just decent artifacts also spending energy

the content drought is real rewards are also highly scarce when you go up the world level it becomes frustrating unless you pay for it it will be very boring in the endgame and that is putting it lightly too much flaws that needs to be addressed such as the rng artifacts system and resin and that is barely scratching the surface

the game was all fine and dandy in the beginning but they started getting greedy and lazy as the game went on the rewards for the anniversary are the obvious but other than that there are more issues than i can type with the word limit kokomi being an absolutely useless unit yoimiya having a broken kit the rushed story quests and the list goes on some arent even that hard to fix you can do better mihoyo

amazing artistic choices are clearly visible in the environment and the game has great storytelling and appealing multidimensional characters though problems still arise the gacha system is very greedy the resin system inhibits endgame progression and the lack of account security is concerning to say the least edit mihoyo have clearly demonstrated that they do not listen to the player base whatsoever nor do they care about the current state of the game hopefully they can hastily resolve this predicament and reengage with the community because i can no longer recommend this game to anyone

i have played this game since october of without any amount of spending into account genshin impact itself at it is core is not a horrible game the graphics are good the controls are smooth the combos on each character and elemental combos are nice the story is interesting but extremely slow so far with the game being out a year now and only one new area out of three problems being resin being too restrictive for free to play players making farming generally horrible across the board

i had pre registered for genshin when it came out and loved it but when you get to some of the mid adventure ranks the grind gets tedious the drops do not increase get better very much and when they do event rewards they do not give you as much as they did when the game was fresh which is rather annoying because that means they want you to spend money on their gatcha stuff which makes it harder to be fp and still be good

great exploration with breath of the wild like systems and better combat imo it becomes a lot less fun once you stop exploring or doing quests and start getting into endgame territory doing the same dungeon times in a row is not all that fun especially since the dungeons are essentially just fighting arenas once you know how to beat it it just becomes tedious also the anniversary rewards suck

how about google stops taking down my reviews first of all the state of the game has been disastrous for the past two patches new characters released with bugged or underperforming kits existing characters having bugs for months and no balance patches for a specific character since patch one two the latest main story quest has been extremely rushed leaving out too many detials and raising questions but in a bad way the quality of the game certainly dropped recently

the art style and music and world building in this game is phenomenal and the combat is fun if only a little restrictive due to how little resources are given in the game however what truly diminishes the joy of the game is how poorly the players feedback have been heard or even acknowledged and the growing list of qol changes and bugs that continue to be left unattended to that along with a recent spate of poorly designed character kits has driven me away until things change

a beautiful world and a good experience with fun gameplay at first but later in the game almost nothing i do feels truly rewarding the rewards are always so underwhelming and building new characters is no longer as fun for me because of how difficult it is as a result of the games strange character leveling system and the tedium that comes with collecting the limited resources i would give a much higher rating if it was not for it is major flaws that become apparent in the endgame

this game is seriously amazing cross platform allows me to log onto my pc and continue playing when i want as long as you do not mind the gacha element it is a terrific free l open world zelda botw style adventure with a great story edit after a year of playing and grinding i find new five characters way too costly in terms of play time and the rewards are so excruciatingly minimal cannot recommend this game anymore

for about a year now the game is now getting boring imagine having more characters even though the game is still in its third nation inazuma standard characters are now useless it looks like this now a pay to win game for you to enjoy hopefully some of the featured characters can also be obtained through standard banners in the future like the four stars

this game is amazing it really is the amount of effort put in it is a beautiful landscape a world to escape to the storyline is amazing and had me hooked from the beginning and the characters and their designs are so fun to build and work with however it is been a year and there are inevitably problems that need to be solved at higher ars rewards get progressively worse the anniversary is also not helping encourage players nor solve these problems

i have been playing since launch and i have seen some major improvements on in game content throughout the updates however communication between the company and players has been steadily declining to the point where sincere feedback is not taken into account anymore it definitely influences the experience especially with a game in which people invest a lot of time and for many players money as well

it is a great game with an interesting story the graphics and sound is decent and you can also pretty much do everything as a free to play user if you would like with that being said the way the updates trickle in and the lack of endgame makes it lacking once you have done whats available with the recent anniversary events and just the overall way the community is treated by the developers it is not worth giving this more than a two

the game starts out very good but it can become repetitive after a while the recent land added was underwhelming and felt rushed and the anniversary is the most lack luster i have ever seen in a game it is hard to believe it is a celebration when the company did nothing for it seems like they are content to put in the bare minimum to keep players engaged after the opening areas

played this game since last december and it was really good i did not mind the scarce resources too much since i played in moderation but at times i felt significantly limited by the resin system and artifact grind i ended up buying the monthly subscriptions to show my support for the game but the direction and attitude the company has taken towards their player base is patronising and unthankful to say the least apart from that i love the music and will listen to it on spotify from now on

the game has been nothing short but wonderful from the start however with the sheer amount of bugs that annoys the hell out of players naming the horrifying auto aim for bow user as an example has not been even mentioned in any bug fixes till today is a sign of how they cherry pick feedbacks from players the latest two one patch has a very obvious rush vibe to it be it in the story quest to the character development needless to say happy birthday mhy

the quality of the game content follows a linear curve along progression easy fun well done in the beginning by the time you get to end game it feels like playing a thinly veiled money making scheme the first nation was great the second was good the third released in two has been wholely lackluster exploration was fun for a while combat is designed poorly progress and the game throws more enemies at you use a shield or get hit into five other enemies hitting you into five more

beautiful game great story so far and runs smoothly on my phone samsung galaxy s would love to see controller support for mobile added as it would be more comfortable to play that way edit over the past year there has been a large drop in communication with players bug fixes and rewards content is heavily gated behind resin energy making the level of farming needed difficult there is a great game here aside from these issues but it needs some serious work at this point

i started game when they were officially released in na and enjoyed a fair bit for a while then i lost interest and kind of stopped playing the game after almost a year i came back to play because my friend said there are a lot more things to do which was true then i was anticipating an anniversary event to boost me up a bit and slowly started to see a lot of people talking about event being really mediocre and turns out it was not only i was baffled by amount of free wish they give out amount of effort they put into anniversary event was just mind boggling in a worst way possible i think it would have been better if they just did not give out anything for free for the anniversary event and just put deep discounts on some of the stuff they offer would have been much better i cannot give anything lower than two star because i did actually enjoy the game and missing out on anniversary freebee will not probably make myself stop playing but this lack of communication ought to get some negative opinions and i think they are all valid

the game is beautiful and the combat system and characters are fun the story started good but the recent inazuma arc was rushed and messy the developer has also slowly stopped communicating with the player base they have ignored common simple qol changes looking at you expidition ui and common feedback on characters kits this does notfeel like the game i started playing a year ago i hope things change for the better

needs controller support asap basic things are easy to do but once you get into rapid character changing combos and tighter movement it becomes a hassle also i have large hands that cover the screen and imporant information gets covered like the bottom character in the party roster on the right side i play on a note ultra and cannot fathom how others play it on small screens

i do not really do review bombing i hate the idea of it but ifi am being honest the rating is not just for the rewards i have come back into the game and i can in all honesty say it is gotten dull the grind and daily content is short and unfullfilling the gacha system continues to be trash with the two hard pity necessary for banner maps being kind of barren and the exploration basically boiling down to go to the interactive map alt tab to genshin and go where the map tells you to they did fix the gameplay from a year ago to being more interractive and responsive but from materials grind to level up boost grind it is too tiring to actually get into if you plan on bothering just play through the story mode and do not get invested wait for a couple of months maybe play only the event stuff and when a new region comes out just play the story mode on that too

to be honest the mobule version should be less demanding on space its practically impossible to download and play this game on most phones unless you have a high capacity phone or sim card you will never get to even see or play the game at all i do not like having to delete everything just to see a insufficient storage message

a really good game i really enjoy genshin a lot and its easy to be fp and avoid microtransactions with a bit of luck and grinding most of the events give the currency you use to buy more wishes for free so spending money is not required to have fun even in late game however i strongly recommend using pc or playstation instead mobile is incredibly frustrating to play on as its very demanding for the device and the controls are not the best if possible avoid playing this on mobile

sooooo play it on pc meh combat is enjoyable play it on mobile yeah i better find another game to invest my time with controls is not that flexible for a game company that already has history in mobile gaming the cpu usage is high due to its being open world game gameplay is boring after a while too many thing to gather for weapons that can be change after an update enemy is not quiet hard mostly rehash recycled ones graphics on performance mode is good

really cool just too much for probably a lot of phones to handle my phone is good quality but it still struggles with the game i cannot even play anymore due to all the updates and having it not be able to load and all the lagging i would suggest making an option where you can make the graphics be less advanced for those with lower quality phones

at first it was a very fun game then once you progress later in game the resin system appear the resin system is so limiting that you basically stuck cannot upgrade weapon cannot upgrade character etc i will probably leave this game soon as the grind get really crazy after the initial stage almost impossible to stay as fp user unless you just want to torture yourself genshin impact resin impact

played on pc verdict awesome from the sound dialogues and the anime esque artstyle everything is just awesome the challenges are pretty varied just like the various characters a large emphasis is laid on combining different elements fire electro cryo etc ps camera is better on pc on android mobile camera work is bad the camera keeps changing rotating along with zooming into the character whenever it wants this becomes terribly annoying especially while fighting enemies two star

its a great game with beautiful graphics a storyline with substance and a decent or mediocre co op option depending on how much you like playing with others but there is just one thing that ruins the whole experience whenyou are knee deep in genshin impact the resin system is absolutely atrocious and limits the progression to upgrade your characters by a mile it really differentiates a whaler between a fp and in the middle are of course the goldfish dolphins if only the resin system was not so bad itd be an absolutely amazing game there is just a lot of things to be done but man the resin in just a knee capper just to clarify i am at ar and have spent a bit of money on the game and not speaking out of my ass the resin system is just garbage

on the surface this is a five star game that should cost sixty dollars upfront due to its expansive world and excellent gameplay with tight controls and intuitive combat reminiscent of xenoblade two however the story and world are far from complete attempting to reach post story progress goals will lead to an exponentially longer grind that has to be spread out over days or weeks because of an energy system that cannot be completely expedited even with hundreds of dollars

before i begin i wanted to like this game unfortunately there are so many small issues i had within the first minutes i couldnt continue first option settings not available right away and when i did unlock them they were very lackluster second please put a lock on feature third please let us adjust control placements the movement pad is almost awkwardly too far towards the center also picking up items requires pressing the button in the middle of the screen very annoying

this game is fantastic starting off but grinds to an absolute halt after playing for the first few days you barely can progress as more and more roadblocks start showing up resin system needing enough money xp books materials to upgrade characters and then eventually you will have to only be able to progress using keys unlocked by doing all your dailies for two days deceptive at best manipulative at worst gacha rates developers should really tweak all this cuz all the good press will sour

truly evidence that popularity does notsuggest greatness the game is absolutely beautiful but nothing you do has any substance story is boring and unskippable there is little significance to exploration because you do not need most of the things in the field food is not necessary to progress in the game enhancing gear just feels like an annoying obstacle that you have to get through just so you can keep progressing and perhaps the most irritating thing is how clunky the transitions from activity such as swimming climbing etc are to going back to walking combat especially during timed challenges in fact it is almost like the climbing time challenges are showcasing how terrible the game is at guessing when the player wants to climb up and when the player does notwant to climb up it is irritating during normal exploration as well since you will randomly climb up trees for no reason not to mention gacha rates are abysmali am still going to play this because i like gambling with free resources but to say that i like this game just because i plan to play it daily would be a complete utter lie

finished stormterrors lair i can safely say that early on the gameplay is an absolute blast however this game has a few fundamental flaws that ruin mid late game for me the game relies heavily on stun mechanics where the only way to defeat most enemies is to use continuous stunning attacks to prevent them from using their stunlocking combos resistance to attack interruption is an actual stat the world levels up as you do making grinding difficult sometimes controls stop working
